title: Hero MotoCorp to launch new scooter models in upcoming quarters ahead of festive season
description: Hero MotoCorp CEO Niranjan Gupta announced plans to launch new scooter models in India's festive season, aiming to re-energize the segment. The company also announced the expansion of its EV brand, Vida, into the affordable segment. Hero MotoCorp reported a standalone net profit of Rs 1,123 crore for Q3 2024, up 36% YoY from Rs 825 crore in the same period.
